notes: Liechtenstein research funds are primarily managed through the University of Liechtenstein and its Research Fund, which supports research projects of scientists and promotes the development of young researchers. Additionally, Liechtenstein participates in international funding schemes, including those offered by the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF).
